text: Pleione chunii is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to southern China. == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Pleione chunii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Endemic orchids of China chunii Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pleione chunii
